title: Freedom of Speech and the New Era of Media. Noam Chomsky Debate
description:
If you want to watch the full interview, please go to our community forum and share your thoughts in the comments. https://community.qbix.com/t/freedom-of-speech-and-capitalism-in-2021-interview-with-noam-chomsky-community-economist/

In this episode, the host and the CEO of Qbix has invited Noam Chomsky as a guest speaker to discuss Freedom of Speech, and the new era of media.

They also go over how things shifted from the traditional way (Newspaper, Magazine, TV ) of broadcasting news to the modern one (Web).
Watch the video to learn more!

Freedom of Speech and the New Era of Media. Noam Chomsky Debate
